name: The Grave Rending
description:
EACH YEAR ON THE NIGHT OF THE WINTER SOLSTICE, NECROMANCERS EMERGE FROM THEIR DECREPIT ABODES OF EXILE TO WREAK HAVOC UPON THE TOWNSFOLK. RAISE AS MANY UNDEAD AS YOU CAN BEFORE JOINING THOSE SICKLY FRIENDS IN THEIR GRAVES. KILL THEM, ABSORB THEIR LIFEFORCE, AND MAKE THOSE SAD SACKS OF MEAT USEFUL ONCE MORE WITH FAR GRANDER PURPOSE. ACT FAST AS CORPSES DECAY AND BEFORE LONG WILL BE OF NO USE TO YOU.

BEWARE THE VENGEFUL SPIRITS OF THE UNDEAD WHO SEEK TO EXACT REVENGE UPON YOU... 

RECIEVE ONE POINT FOR EACH UNDEAD RAISED AND ONE POINT FOR EVERY TWO TOWNSFOLK KILLED.

CONTROLS:

WASD - MOVE

LEFT MOUSE - SLASH ATTACK

SPACEBAR - RAISE DEAD
